name: ColorVisionTest
description:
Can you see the smallest differences in colors?  Do you want to check if you have this ability? This Test is for you!

keys 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 used to change difficulty(only those that upside your keyboard)

SPACE - to the next test.

the current level and the answer can be seen in the black window.

Enjoy :)
